description: The vessel's name, as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's callsign, as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's IMO number, as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's country flag (2-letter country code), as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's actual time of departure out of Singapore waters, as returned from the MDH API response.
The datetime that the data was first fetched from the MDH API.
The datetime that the data was last updated in the database.
